properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Attractive five bedroom detached family home set on 1 acre of land, situated within 2 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; four receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms each with ensuites and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include triple glazing, seperate double garage and an outdoor swimming pool with changing rooms

Two bed flat situated in the heart of town, taking advantage of the many independant and high street shops and supermarkets. This property includes a balcony overlooking the town square. Particular immenities include combination boiler, breakfast bar and modern kitchen

Fantastic rural location with close ties to the main town. This property is set on 4 acres of land and has aprooved planning permission for a localStorage rear extension. The property has been recently refurbished with a clean open layout.
Built in 1890, this beautiful end terrace house is perfect for a new family with a great outdoor space. This property is grade 2 listed and incudes many original features such as open fires.

New build one bedroom flat, due to be finished in late April. The vendor includes free personalised finishes including lighting and kitchin design being suited to first time buyers. The location is ideal for familes with children at school due to being in the catchment areas for 2 primary and one secondary school.
